alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued April 29 at 8:10PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR OZONE FROM 1000 PM FRIDAY UNTIL 900 PM FRIDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Ozone. WHERE...El Paso County. Locations include, but are not limited to Colorado Springs, Manitou Springs, and Monument. WHEN...1000 PM Friday April 29 to 900 PM Friday April 29 IMPACTS...An intense storm system is producing a stratospheric intrusion which is increasing ozone concentrations across El Paso County. Ozone concentrations will likely decrease gradually Friday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms and breathing discomfort in active children and adults and people with lung disease, such as asthma. Active children and adults, and people with lung disease, such as asthma, should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion.
